attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the prime minister should not go ahead with the 42 day detention scheme. the goverment should scrap this scheme as it won't make no difference. what if someone was held under this new law for 42 days and it was mistaken identity.the goverment just about won with the help of the dup who's 9 member's voted for the proposed scheme and guess what the goverment won by 9 votes- the same number of the dup who voted in the house of lord. mr davis resigned in protest at the result. scrap the proposed scheme it will not combat terrorism
